tests.title: [C6754] Search PatientIds by LocationDetails (two filters, include inactive by default)
tests.fullTitle: [P31][S269] Patients API Test Suite [C6754] Search PatientIds by LocationDetails (two filters, include inactive by default)

err.message:
CypressError: 

Test steps were:

1. Querying patient observations for Section/Block/Cell/Bed
2. Querying patient observations for Section/Block/Cell/Bed
3. Running your selected query against

centricityps database:

 |--[ 
    SELECT TOP (10)
      t1.[PID]           AS PID,
      t2.[LocationId]    AS LOCATIONID,
      t1.[HDID]          AS HDID,
      t1.[OBSTYPE]       AS OBSTYPE,
      t1.[OBSVALUE]      AS OBSVALUE
    FROM [centricityps_qa].[dbo].[OBS] AS t1
    JOIN [centricityps_qa].[dbo].[PatientProfile] AS t2
      ON t1.[PID] = t2.[PID]
    WHERE t1.[CHANGE] = 2
      AND t1.[HDID] IN (81745,81746,81747,81748)
    ORDER BY t1.[PID] DESC
   ]--|

`cy.task('queryDb')` failed with the following error:

> Invalid object name 'centricityps_qa.dbo.OBS'.

https://on.cypress.io/api/task

Because this error occurred during a `before each` hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: `[P31][S269] Patients API Te...`
